description:
Gao’s recruited by the Seifukai. Shido’s up to no good, working secretly behind the scenes to increase his chances of winning the ABC Cup. The second match of the tournament begins, pitting all-out strength against the time-honored art of ninja warfare.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Power vs. Ninja Arts! A Fierce Competition!
パワーvs忍法! 食うか斬られるか!?
